DOC.detailed_description: The study design include 9 bariatric center across Asia region ( China , Korea , Phillipine , Singapore Taiwan ) . Totally 500 patient confirm diagnosis T2DM BMI 25-35 kg/m2 enrol January 2011 December 2013 . Preoperative surgical parameter , blood , biochemistry data , gastrointestinal hormone , upper gastrointestinal study , abdominal ultrasound , peri-operative & postoperative complication record analyze . Patient inclusion criterion : 1 . ) T2DM diagnose 1 year ; 2 . ) age range 30-60 year ; 3 . ) BMI 25-35 kg/m2 ; 4 . ) Patient consent receive long-term follow periodic check . Exclusion criterion : 1 . ) T1DM ; 2 . ) Substance abuse ; 3 . ) Planned pregnancy within 2 year surgery ; 3 . ) Uncontrolled psychiatric disease ; 4 . ) Lost follow . Institutions inclusion criterion : Professional experience 30 LRYGB perform . Trial termination criterion : Surgical mortality 0.5 % first year , Diabetes remission rate failure 20 % one year . All data collect yearly one center . The analysis parameter , statistic brief result inform enrolled institution periodically .
